price: Bazoba bakikijwe n’imisore myiza ibahereza, ikurakuranwa, iri mu runganwe rumwe, idasaza. Uyibonye, ku bwiza bwayo wogira ngo ni “lulu[2]” zisanzajwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
footnotes: [2] Lulu, ni ubwoko bw’ubutare bwiburungushuye, bucukurwa mw’ibahari, bukaba buboneka mu binyabuzima biba musi yaryo, bukagira amabara atandukanye; nk’ibara ryera, iryirabura, n’ayandi. Ni ubutare buzimvye cane.

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim wil'dānun mukhalladūna idhā ra-aytahum ḥasib'tahum lu'lu-an manthūran
